attributes.action: prevent banks from charging a monthly fee for having a bank account.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i have no doubt that soon all banks and building societies will charge for simply having to have an account. This will affect the impoverished and vulnerable, as people on benefits and pensioners have now been forced into having to open accounts to receive their benefits/pensions, and have NO CHOICE.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
